Headline: #80 Irving Park Temporary Reroute at Irving Park/Nashville
ShortDescription: Revised: 80 Irving Park buses temp rrtd via Irving Park, Oak Park, Forest Preserve, Narragansett & Irving Park, due to street blockage at Irving Park/Nashville

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Revised: #80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Irving Park, Oak Park, Forest Preserve, Narragansett, then resume their normal route at Irving Park, due to street blockage near Irving Park/Nashville.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Washington. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at Washington.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Service Delayed at Cicero
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at Cicero due to a door problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at Cicero due to a door problem. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
